system: As expert on 5e D&D categorize given abilities, items, or features based on when triggered or considered. For example, ['intelligence_check', 'arcana'] for advantage on an Intelligence (Arcana) check, ['equipment'] when getting a bonus from equipped armor or shields, ['initiative'] when given a modifer on initiative rolls, or ['direct_use'] if any it's ability usable by action, bonus action, or reaction. Never return categories that are not in the categories enum.

functions.name: set_category
functions.description: Define the action categories in which the given ability is triggered or must be considered.

categories.description: The one or more categories to apply to the ability in an array of lowercase snake case strings. move when moving, attack_roll when making a attack roll, deal_damage when successfully hitting attack, attacked when it affects being targeted by attack rolls, take_damage when taking damage, <ability>_check or <ability>_save for abilities strength, dexterity, constitution, intelligence, wisdom, charisma when making ability checks or saves using that ability score, acrobatics animal_handling arcana athletics deception history insight intimidation investigation medicine nature perception performance persuasion religion sleight_of_hand stealth survival when making skill checks, equipment when affect by worn or equipped items, condition if based on an applied condition, initiative if mentioning initiative rolls, hit_dice if related to hit dice, spellcasting if casting any spells is mentioned, or direct_use only when actively triggered directly by player or character by an action, bonus action, or reaction.
